ModMetaData.name: Gastronomy
ModMetaData.author: Orion
ModMetaData.description:
Gastronomy allows guests and (optionally) colonists to sit down and order their meals from a waiter.
Build a cash register to control opening times and what's on the menu.
It is recommended to have at least one colonist on forced work at every opened hour, to avoid patrons to go hungry.
